# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(FilledBoundary_plot)

ADD_PLOT_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(FilledBoundary)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
FilledBoundaryPluginInfo.C
FilledBoundaryCommonPluginInfo.C
FilledBoundaryAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
FilledBoundaryPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
FilledBoundaryGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisFilledBoundaryPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisFilledBoundaryPlotWindow.h
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
FilledBoundaryViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
FilledBoundaryViewerPluginInfo.C
avtFilledBoundaryPlot.C
avtFilledBoundaryFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
FilledBoundaryViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
FilledBoundaryEnginePluginInfo.C
avtFilledBoundaryPlot.C
avtFilledBoundaryFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_PLOT_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IFilledBoundaryPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IFilledBoundaryPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IFilledBoundaryPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    QT_WRAP_CPP(GFilledBoundaryPlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})
    ADD_LIBRARY(GFilledBoundaryPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GFilledBoundaryPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VFilledBoundaryPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(VFilledBoundaryPlot VIEWER)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VFilledBoundaryPlot visitcommon viewer )

    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GFilledBoundaryPlot VFilledBoundaryPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            FilledBoundaryScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyFilledBoundaryAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SFilledBoundaryPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        IF(WIN32)
            # This prevents python from #defining snprintf as _snprintf
            SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(SFilledBoundaryPlot PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS HAVE_SNPRINTF)
        ENDIF()
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SFilledBoundaryPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SFilledBoundaryPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY FilledBoundaryAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/plots)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaFilledBoundary ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} FilledBoundaryAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EFilledBoundaryPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFilledBoundaryPlot_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtplotter_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFilledBoundaryPlot_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFilledBoundaryPlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EFilledBoundaryPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFilledBoundaryPlot_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtplotter_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFilledBoundaryPlot_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFilledBoundaryPlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(plots ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(plots FilledBoundary ${INSTALLTARGETS})
